background_description: Graduated pink to red hues with a soft, heart-shaped blur effect in the center
objects_description: Heart-shaped bottle with a white lid filled with pink liquid and black pearls at the bottom, labeled with text
caption:

(The free drink will be of equal or lesser value. Participating locations only, check your local store for promotion availability.)

background_description: The background features a plain, vibrant pink color with soft, out of focus heart shapes scattered throughout.
objects_description: There are two heart-shaped bottles with a textured liquid containing black spherical elements at the bottom, which resemble bubble tea tapioca pearls. The bottles have silver caps and one of them has a label with text.
text: Reminder love yourself & manifest positivity this month <3
caption:
